title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 1.3 - Specific requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 1.3 - Specific requirements

State Regulations

An application for authority to exercise any fiduciary
power shall consist of: (a) a
certified copy of a resolution of the applicant's board of directors, authorizing the applicant to file the application and to undertake the
fiduciary activities specified in the application; and
(b) a written statement covering the matters
specified in section
1.2
(b)-(d)
of this

Supervisory Policy and such other matters as the Banking Department shall
request after consultation with the applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
